Dr. Eric Feigl-Ding (Eric Ding) is a health economist, epidemiologist, and nutrition scientist at the Harvard Chan School of Public Health, and an expert advisor to the World Health Organization.

推文正在被激烈討論中。教授正在全力辯護自己不是在散播恐懼。長推，長推，長長的推，140字去死去死。

https://twitter.com/DrEricDing/status/1220919589623803905
此推驚呼每一傳染者會傳染3.8人，熱核武器級傳染病！

而後，目前教授置頂的推： https://twitter.com/DrEricDing/status/1221132573340061697
"Estimate each infected case infects 2.6 other people"
每一感染者會傳染2.6人。

總之，這仍然是危險的惡性傳染病。
